CutSceneText.Text: Six to ten Daevas fight for supremacy in the Arena of Chaos.
You have no allies. This is a free-for-all contest.
Defeating an opponent will earn you points.
The first to reach the target number of points is the winner.
The fight consists of 3 rounds, and you won't suffer from Soul Sickness if you die.
If no one reaches the point target, the winner is the one with the most points after 3 rounds.
I hope that was all clear.
